```{r}
make_cdr_heatmap <- function(x, rowColor, colColor, Rowv=T, Colv=T, binary=T){
  
  if(binary){
    col_cdr = c("red", "green")
    key_show = F
  } else {
    col_cdr = colorRampPalette(c("red",  "white",  "green"))(n = 20)
    key_show = T
  }
  
  
  heatmap_cdr <- heatmap.2(
    x,
    Rowv = Rowv,  # perform hierarchical clustering on rows
    Colv = Colv,  # Perform hierarchical clustering on columns
    col = col_cdr,  # Use the custom binary colors
    dendrogram = "both",
    trace = "none",
    key = key_show,  # Disable the default color key
    RowSideColors = rowColor,
    ColSideColors = colColor,
    labRow = FALSE,  # Hide row names
    labCol = FALSE,  # Hide column names
    main = "Cancer Drug Response",
    lwid = c(0.2, 5),
    lhei = c(1, 5)
  )
  
  # Add legend after creating the heatmap
  legend(y=1.15, x=0.0, xpd=TRUE, legend = c("0", "1"), fill = c("red", "green"), bty = "n", cex = 0.8, title = "Sensitivity")
  
  mtext("Cance\n Types", side = 2, line = 0.5, at = 1, las = 2, cex = 0.8)
  
  return(heatmap_cdr)
}
```

```{r load_data}
c_data <- read.csv(here(dataFolder, "c_data.csv"), row.names = 1)
c_meta <- read.csv(here(dataFolder, "c_meta.csv"))
d_data <- read.csv(here(dataFolder, "d_data.csv"), row.names = 1)

colnames(cdr) <- gsub("^X", "",  colnames(cdr))

cat("Cancer RNAseq data dim: ", dim(c_data))
cat("Drug PCA-based feature data dim: ", dim(d_data))
cat("CDR data dim: ", dim(cdr))
```

```{r cancer_type_counts, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}

c_type_levels = c("ALL", "LAML", "LCML", # leukemia
           "CLL", "DLBC", # lymphoma
           "MM",# blood, myeloma
           "LGG", # Brain Lower Grade Glioma 	胶质瘤, nervous_system
           "GBM", # Glioblastoma multiforme	多形成性胶质细胞瘤, nervous_system
           "MB", # nervous_system
           "NB", # neoblastoma 神经母细胞瘤
           "HNSC", # head & neck 头颈鳞状细胞癌
           "SKCM", # Skin Cutaneous Melanoma	皮肤黑色素瘤
           "BRCA", # breast
           "STAD", # Stomach adenocarcinoma	胃癌
           "ESCA", # Esophageal 食管癌

           "LIHC", # liver
           "LUAD", "LUSC", # lung, lung_NSCLC

           "PAAD", # Pancreatic adenocarcinoma	胰腺癌
           "THCA", # Thyroid carcinoma	甲状腺癌, thyroid
           "OV", # Ovarian serous cystadenocarcinoma	卵巢浆液性囊腺癌, urogenital_system
           "UCEC", # Uterine Corpus Endometrial Carcinoma	子宫内膜癌, urogenital_system
           "PRAD", # Prostate adenocarcinoma	前列腺癌, urogenital_system

           "CESC" # Cervical squamous cell carcinoma and endocervical adenocarcinoma 宫颈鳞癌和腺癌, urogenital_system
           ) 

c_meta$cancer_type <- factor(c_meta$cancer_type, levels = c_type_levels)


c_type_color = c("#8B2323", "#FF4040", "#FF7256","#FFD300", "#F6FF00",  # leukemia, lymphoma
                 "#00FFE5",
                 "#5800FF", "#C100FF","#AB82FF", # nervous_system

count_c_type_df <- data.frame("c_type" = factor(names(c_type_color), levels = names(c_type_color)),
                              "Freq"= c(as.numeric(table(c_meta$cancer_type)), sum(is.na(c_meta$cancer_type))),
                              "c_type_color" = c_type_color)

ggplot(count_c_type_df, aes(c_type, Freq, fill = c_type)) +
  geom_col() + 
  scale_x_discrete(limits=rev) +

```
```{r}
map_value_to_color <- function(x) {
  if (is.na(x)) {
    return("darkgray")  # Missing values (NA) will be gray
  } else if (x == "0") {
    return("red")   # 0 will be red
  } else if (x == "1") {
    return("green") # 1 will be green
  } else {
    return("blue")  # Other values will be blue
  }
}

c_colors <- rep(count_c_type_df$c_type_color, count_c_type_df$Freq)
```

```{r}
cdr_tmp <- as.matrix(cdr)
cdr_tmp <- cdr_tmp[heatmap_all$rowInd, heatmap_all$colInd]

cdr_all_row_color = rep("white", nrow(cdr_tmp))
cdr_all_col_color = rep("white", ncol(cdr_tmp))

cdr_all_row_color[which(rownames(cdr_tmp) %in% c_names_0)] = "lightgreen"
cdr_all_row_color[which(rownames(cdr_tmp) %in% c_names_other)] = "lightgrey"

cdr_all_col_color[which(colnames(cdr_tmp) %in% d_names_0)] = "lightgreen"
cdr_all_col_color[which(colnames(cdr_tmp) %in% d_names_other)] = "lightgrey"
     
if(subcluster) {
    cdr_all_row_color[which(rownames(cdr_tmp) %in% c_names_01)] = "lightblue"
    cdr_all_row_color[which(rownames(cdr_tmp) %in% c_names_1)] = "khaki1"

    cdr_all_col_color[which(colnames(cdr_tmp) %in% d_names_01)] = "lightblue"
    cdr_all_col_color[which(colnames(cdr_tmp) %in% d_names_1)] = "khaki1"
} 
```

```{r all_cdr_col_skin_order_heatmap, fig.height=6, fig.width=12}
cdr_all_col_color = rep("white", ncol(cdr_tmp_all_1))

cdr_all_row_color[which(rownames(cdr_tmp_all_1) %in% c_names_0)] = "lightgreen"
cdr_all_row_color[which(rownames(cdr_tmp_all_1) %in% c_names_other)] = "lightgrey"

cdr_all_col_color[which(colnames(cdr_tmp_all_1) %in% d_names_0)] = "lightgreen"
cdr_all_col_color[which(colnames(cdr_tmp_all_1) %in% d_names_other)] = "lightgrey"
     
if(subcluster) {
    cdr_all_row_color[which(rownames(cdr_tmp_all_1) %in% c_names_01)] = "lightblue"
    cdr_all_row_color[which(rownames(cdr_tmp_all_1) %in% c_names_1)] = "khaki1"

    cdr_all_col_color[which(colnames(cdr_tmp_all_1) %in% d_names_01)] = "lightblue"
    cdr_all_col_color[which(colnames(cdr_tmp_all_1) %in% d_names_1)] = "khaki1"

} 

cdr_heatmap_hier = make_cdr_heatmap(cdr_tmp_all_1, cdr_all_row_color, cdr_all_col_color, F, F)
```

```{r}
c_cluster_all$c_cluster_test = factor(c_cluster_all$c_cluster_test, levels = c( "0", "0 & 1", "1", "0 & 1 & 2", "1 & 2", "0 & 2", "2", "-1"))
c_cluster_all$c_cluster = factor(c_cluster_all$c_cluster, levels = c( "0", "0 & 1", "1", "0 & 1 & 2", "1 & 2", "0 & 2", "2", "-1"))
d_cluster_all$d_cluster_test = factor(d_cluster_all$d_cluster_test, levels = c( "0", "0 & 1", "1", "0 & 1 & 2", "1 & 2", "0 & 2", "2", "-1"))
d_cluster_all$d_cluster = factor(d_cluster_all$d_cluster, levels = c( "0", "0 & 1", "1", "0 & 1 & 2", "1 & 2", "0 & 2", "2", "-1"))

c_cluster_all$color = "lightgrey"
c_cluster_all$color[c_cluster_all$c_cluster == "1"] <- "lightgreen"
c_cluster_all$color[c_cluster_all$c_cluster == "1 & 2"] <- "lightblue"
c_cluster_all$color[c_cluster_all$c_cluster == "2"] <- "khaki1"

c_cluster_all$color_test <- "lightgrey"
c_cluster_all$color_test[c_cluster_all$c_cluster_test == "0"] <- "darkgreen"
c_cluster_all$color_test[c_cluster_all$c_cluster_test == "0 & 1"] <- "green"
c_cluster_all$color_test[c_cluster_all$c_cluster_test == "1"] <- "lightgreen"
c_cluster_all$color_test[c_cluster_all$c_cluster_test == "1 & 2"] <- "lightblue"
c_cluster_all$color_test[c_cluster_all$c_cluster_test == "0 & 2"] <- "skyblue"
c_cluster_all$color_test[c_cluster_all$c_cluster_test == "0 & 1 & 2"] <- "cadetblue1"
c_cluster_all$color_test[c_cluster_all$c_cluster_test == "2"] <- "khaki1"

d_cluster_all$color = "lightgrey"
d_cluster_all$color[d_cluster_all$d_cluster == "1"] <- "lightgreen"
d_cluster_all$color[d_cluster_all$d_cluster == "1 & 2"] <- "lightblue"
d_cluster_all$color[d_cluster_all$d_cluster == "2"] <- "khaki1"

d_cluster_all$color_test <- "lightgrey"
d_cluster_all$color_test[d_cluster_all$d_cluster_test == "0"] <- "darkgreen"
d_cluster_all$color_test[d_cluster_all$d_cluster_test == "0 & 1"] <- "green"
d_cluster_all$color_test[d_cluster_all$d_cluster_test == "1"] <- "lightgreen"
d_cluster_all$color_test[d_cluster_all$d_cluster_test == "1 & 2"] <- "lightblue"
d_cluster_all$color_test[d_cluster_all$d_cluster_test == "0 & 2"] <- "skyblue"
d_cluster_all$color_test[d_cluster_all$d_cluster_test == "0 & 1 & 2"] <- "cadetblue1"
d_cluster_all$color_test[d_cluster_all$d_cluster_test == "2"] <- "khaki1"

```
